definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist

Huguan county in Changzhi 長治|长治[Chang2 zhi4], Shanxi
to receive troops with food and drink (idiom)/to give troops a hearty welcome/also pr. [dan1 si4 hu2 jiang1]
jade pot for cold water/curling (sport)/curling puck
jade ice jug and autumn moon (idiom, from poem by Song writer Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡); fig. spotless white and pure/flawless person

sentences.english: The child is too young to hold a kettle. The water spilled all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 孩子太小提不动壶，水泼出来淌了一地。

sentences.english: The pothole fractured a bolt on the axle.
sentences.chinese: 壶穴使车轴上的一只螺钉破碎。

sentences.english: Stream north Huping cliff, towering cliffs, towering like a bottle-shaped pot and name.
sentences.chinese: 涧北有壶瓶崖，危崖万丈，突兀类壶瓶状而名。

sentences.english: Lifting kettlebells has a different feel than lifting dumbbells.
sentences.chinese: 起重壶铃有比解除哑铃不同的感觉。

sentences.english: There's only one teapot in the world , her name is called Yixing.
sentences.chinese: 世界上只有一把壶，她的名字叫宜兴。

sentences.english: Remove the cover and plunger of the French press.
sentences.chinese: 先将法压壶上方压盖取出，将咖啡粉装入壶中。

sentences.english: Remove the cover and plunger of the French press.
sentences.chinese: 先将法压壶上方压盖取出，将咖啡粉装入壶中。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnostic value of spiral CT in pancreas ampulla carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨壶腹部癌的螺旋CT诊断价值。

sentences.english: I put the pot on the gas-oven, and got away.
sentences.chinese: 我把壶放在煤气灶上，然后就走开把这件事忘掉了。

sentences.english: This can be seen in this wine ewer and warming basin.
sentences.chinese: 这可以看出在这个盆地葡萄酒壶和升温。

sentences.english: This white porcelain ewer , or pouring vessel, is considered to be the among the most remarkable of all Chinese ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 此白色大口水罐，或称壶，被认为是中国陶瓷的标志。

sentences.english: Objective To study an operation alleviating the abdominal pain in the patients with advanced peripheral carcinoma around Vater ampulla.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨解决晚期壶腹周围癌顽固性腹痛的方法。

sentences.english: There are many kettle holes of different size and shape on riverbeds.
sentences.chinese: 河床底部还保存有大小不等形态各异的壶穴。

sentences.english: The Pot Hole Sight is famous worldwide.
Pots on both sides of each floor veranda door, which pass a small room, outside the pass Yan Lang.
sentences.chinese: 每层廊子两侧都有壶门，内通小室，外通檐廊。

definition: a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
handle in the shape of a hoop
small cup for adding water to an ink stone
